channel.title: Tesie Mills Twitter Feed
channel.description: Original tweet-style content from Tesie Mills.

item.title: If “waking up early” is the key to success, I guess I’m dest...
item.description: If “waking up early” is the key to success, I guess I’m destined for a lifetime of chaotic mid-mornings and soft pants.
item.author: Tesie Mills

item.title: Petey sprinted across the room at 3:12 AM, bounced off the w...
item.description: Petey sprinted across the room at 3:12 AM, bounced off the wall, and then looked offended *at me*.
item.author: Tesie Mills

item.title: This morning, Petey knocked a mug off the counter, made eye ...
item.description: This morning, Petey knocked a mug off the counter, made eye contact mid-shatter, and then casually sauntered away.
item.author: Tesie Mills

item.title: I sneezed during a Zoom call and Nelly *left the room* like ...
item.description: I sneezed during a Zoom call and Nelly *left the room* like I had deeply offended her soul.
item.author: Tesie Mills

item.title: THREAD: Things I’ve Tried to Become Via Impulse Shopping

item.title: Started a new workout. It’s called “dragging the laundry bas...
item.description: Started a new workout. It’s called “dragging the laundry basket with my foot while muttering about capitalism.”
item.author: Tesie Mills

item.title: I didn’t fall behind. I took a scenic detour with snacks and...
item.description: I didn’t fall behind. I took a scenic detour with snacks and questionable decision-making.
item.author: Tesie Mills

item.title: “Pivoting isn’t quitting. It’s optimizing.” – Tesie, halfway...
item.description: “Pivoting isn’t quitting. It’s optimizing.” – Tesie, halfway through abandoning her entire workout plan for interpretive dance in the kitchen
item.author: Tesie Mills

item.title: “Adulthood is just googling how to do things and pretending ...
item.description: “Adulthood is just googling how to do things and pretending you already knew.”
item.author: Tesie Mills

item.title: I just realized my cats run a full surveillance state. I sne...
item.description: I just realized my cats run a full surveillance state. I sneeze and Petey logs it. Nelly documents it in the “suspicious activity” report.
item.author: Tesie Mills

item.title: “Forgiveness isn’t saying ‘you were right.’ It’s saying, ‘I ...
item.description: “Forgiveness isn’t saying ‘you were right.’ It’s saying, ‘I don’t want to carry this flaming bag of resentment anymore.’”
item.author: Tesie Mills

item.title: THREAD: Why My Cats Might Be Possessed 👻
item.description: THREAD: Why My Cats Might Be Possessed 👻
item.author: Tesie Mills

item.title: “The best goals aren’t the ones you stick to perfectly—they’...
item.description: “The best goals aren’t the ones you stick to perfectly—they’re the ones that work for your slightly chaotic, snack-driven lifestyle.”
item.author: Tesie Mills

item.title: Nelly refused to eat until I stirred her food counterclockwi...
item.description: Nelly refused to eat until I stirred her food counterclockwise. I now fear I’ve accidentally summoned something.
item.author: Tesie Mills

item.title: My cats staged a breakfast protest this morning. Just intens...
item.description: My cats staged a breakfast protest this morning. Just intense eye contact and synchronized judgment.
item.author: Tesie Mills

item.title: THREAD: My Cats as Corporate Professionals 🐾

item.author: Tesie Mills

item.title: Me: “I’m going to reinvent myself.” Also me: *buys fancy pla...
item.description: Me: “I’m going to reinvent myself.” Also me: *buys fancy planner, uses it once, eats cheese in bed by Thursday.*
item.author: Tesie Mills

item.title: THREAD: The Secret Handbook of Adulthood 🧾
item.description: THREAD: The Secret Handbook of Adulthood 🧾
item.author: Tesie Mills

item.title: “If your cat stares at the wall like it owes them money, run...
item.description: “If your cat stares at the wall like it owes them money, run. They’ve seen something you can’t.”
item.author: Tesie Mills
